title: I can't see a ward selection box and I'm unable to interact with it

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Does anyone know how to fix this?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{item:2043}}

replies.body: We're aware of an issue where some ward skins don't appear or prevent the ward skin selection box from appearing. We're in the process of a fix! It's an issue that's occurring on our end, not your particular client. Thanks for your patience! <3
It's a known bug.  They are trying to fix it.  It isn't just you.
